sentences: Frederik Rung  (June 14, 1854 - January 22, 1914) was a Danish conductor and composer.
He was the son of composer Henrik Rung (1807-1871).
He studied 1867-70 at the Royal Danish Academy of Music  under Johan Peter Emilius Hartmann and Niels Gade.
Songs and guitar pieces on Roser og Kjerlighed: Inspired by Norway with songs by his father Henrik Rung.
